import React from"react";import"./portfolio.css";import Menu from"./Menu";import{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Portfolio=()=>{const[items,setItems]=useState(Menu);const filterItem=categoryItem=>{const updatedMenuItems=Menu.filter(currentElem=>{//keeping the currentElem in Menu Array if element's category is what we want
return currentElem.category===categoryItem;});setItems(updatedMenuItems);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"work container section",id:"portfolio",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section__title",children:"Recent Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"work__filters",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"work__item",children:"Everything"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"work__item",onClick:()=>filterItem("Creative"),children:"Creative"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"work__item",children:"Art"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"work__item",children:"Design"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"work__item",children:"Branding"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"work__container grid",children:items.map(elem=>{const{id,image,title,category,link}=elem;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"work__card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"work__thumbnail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:"",className:"work__img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"work__mask"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"work__category",children:category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"work__title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:link,className:"work__button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"icon-link work__button-icon"})})]},id);})})]});};export default Portfolio;
